CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. V OC (open-circuit voltage)
2. I SC (short-circuit current)
3. FF (fill factor)
4. PCE (power conversion efficiency)

These are all names of materials or parameters used in the field of electronics and photovoltaics.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for the confusion. Here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Name in the given paragraph:

1. V OC
2. I SC
3. FF

These three entities are the names of materials or parameters used in the field of electronics and photovoltaics, and they are clearly mentioned in the paragraph as entities that are relevant to the topic.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| V OC |
| I SC |
| FF |

Note that these are the exact words used in the original paragraph to refer to the materials or parameters.
